channel.title: Black Eye Record's Podcast
channel.description: Black Eye Records is a New York based unsigned Hip Hop Label, Offering a variety of hip hop, Rap, Crunk, Hip Hop Dance & Gangster rap by their artists. Also news, podcasts, blogs & other info…
channel.itunes:subtitle: Where U Hear Hip Hop's Future Stars !
channel.itunes:author: THA MISSES / BLACK EYE ARTISTS

item.title: CERTIFIED, VOL. 1
item.description: Response to my Mixtape, “Certified, Vol. 1” been heatin’ up, thanks to our friends. Check it out: www.facebook.com/thamissses, www.blackeyerecords.podomatic.com, www.twitter.com/thamisses, www.Myspace.com/blackeyeinc & www.linkedin.com/in/thamisses, etc

item.title: Tha Misses track “On Tha Run” No#1…
item.description: The world famous DJ Curt Creator has released his weekly Top 10 countdown, with Tha Misses track “On Tha Run” No#1… Curt Creator, LL Cool J and the Boomdizzle team are rewarding her with a pair of Boomdizzle Ear Buds... Hello Tha Misses, We at Boomdizzle would like to personally congratulate you on making it onto the World Famous DJ Cut Creator's Weekly Top Ten @ http://blog.boomdizzle.com/2011/02/23/dj-cut-creators-weekly-top-ten-26/. Your track "On Tha Run" http://www.boomdizzle.com/track/on-tha-run was the #1 pick. Through your dedication and hard work, Cut Creator, LL Cool J, and the entire Boomdizzle Team would like to reward you with a pair of Boomdizzle Ear Buds. To claim your prize, please either reply back to this email or send us an email at admin or feedback@boomdizzle.com with your name and mailing address. If you have any questions, please let us know. Once again, congratulations! -Boomdizzle
item.dc:creator: THA MISSES / BLACK EYE ARTISTS
item.itunes:summary:
The world famous DJ Curt Creator has released his weekly Top 10 countdown, with Tha Misses track “On Tha Run” No#1… Curt Creator, LL Cool J and the Boomdizzle team are rewarding her with a pair of Boomdizzle Ear Buds...
Hello Tha Misses,
We at Boomdizzle would like to personally congratulate you on making it onto the World Famous DJ Cut Creator's Weekly Top Ten @ http://blog.boomdizzle.com/2011/02/23/dj-cut-creators-weekly-top-ten-26/. Your track "On Tha Run" http://www.boomdizzle.com/track/on-tha-run was the #1 pick. Through your dedication and hard work, Cut Creator, LL Cool J, and the entire Boomdizzle Team would like to reward you with a pair of Boomdizzle Ear Buds.
To claim your prize, please either reply back to this email or send us an email at admin or feedback@boomdizzle.com with your name and mailing address. If you have any questions, please let us know. Once again, congratulations!
-Boomdizzle

item.title: “A NOW” a Dirty South Hot Track !!
item.description: “A NOW” a new Dirty South Hot Track by “Tha Misses”, jus’ posted on our Myspace & other Sites..Check it out, let us know what u think. www.cdbaby.com/cd/blackeyekamp www.blackeyerecords.net www.myspace.com/blackeyeinc www.myspace.com/blackeyemusic

item.title: SEND FEEDBACK "THE CHOSEN ONE" & “DA BODY”
item.description: Last week we posted a track, “DA BODY” from our Crew, “Ambush” newly released CD, “AMBUSH #3”. Please take a listen, Download it, (it’s Free), and send feedback; You may also hear Snips of the full CD on the below sites. A Free Single, “The Chosen One” by Mikey D is also posted. www.myspace.com/blackeyeinc www.myspace.com/blackeyemusic www.blackeyerecords.net www.cdbaby.com/cd/blackeyekamp

item.title: MIKEY D NEW SINGLE SINGLE "THE CHOSEN ONE"
item.description: “Ambush” is back with their first full studio CD, “Ambush”; and it’s full of hard hitting, in your face, luv, hustling, sex, gangsta, and all those things you like to keep undercover. Fuel by 17 tracks of hip hop by rap legend Mikey D, Curt Digga, Lotto and Shon’don. (ALSO CHECK OUT MIKEY D NEW SINGLE "THE CHOSEN ONE"). “Free” tracks available for DJ’s, Industry People, and all our Friends on Myspace, Podomatic and all our Pages…”Dirty” & “Clean” versions on our myspace sites. If you like your hip hop raw, with lots of goodies thrown in, this CD’s for you!! www.myspace.com/blackeyeinc www.blackeyerecords.net www.myspace.com/blackeyemusic www.cdbaby.com/cd/blackeyekamp ambush444@aol.com
item.dc:creator: THA MISSES / BLACK EYE ARTISTS
item.itunes:summary:
“Ambush” is back with their first full studio CD, “Ambush”; and it’s full of hard hitting, in your face, luv, hustling, sex, gangsta, and all those things you like to keep undercover. Fuel by 17 tracks of hip hop by rap legend Mikey D, Curt Digga, Lotto and Shon’don. (ALSO CHECK OUT MIKEY D NEW SINGLE "THE CHOSEN ONE").
“Free” tracks available for DJ’s, Industry People, and all our Friends on Myspace, Podomatic and all our Pages…”Dirty” & “Clean” versions on our myspace sites.
If you like your hip hop raw, with lots of goodies thrown in, this CD’s for you!!
